page.shortlink: grid component client side canrowsubmit event
page.description: Fires when the user tries to submit changes to a row. If the event returns false, the action is cancelled.
page.discussion: The *[js:canRowSubmit]* event is triggered when the user clicks the submit button for an individual row or when changes for a specific row number are submitted using the *[js:{grid.object}.submitGridPartRow]* method.

argument.name: e
argument.description: An object passed to the event that contains the following properties:

property.name: rowNumber
property.description: The row number of the Grid row that fired the event. New record rows have negative row numbers.
